# R-Type Instructions Test
# ADD x5, x1, x2 (x5 = x1 + x2 = 5 + 10 = 15)
00000000001000001000001010110011
# SUB x6, x2, x1 (x6 = x2 - x1 = 10 - 5 = 5)
01000000000100010000001100110011
# AND x7, x2, x3 (x7 = x2 & x3 = 0xA & 0xFFFFFFFF = 0xA)
00000000001100010111001110110011
# OR x8, x1, x2 (x8 = x1 | x2 = 5 | 10 = 15)
00000000001000001110010000110011
# XOR x9, x1, x2 (x9 = x1 ^ x2 = 5 ^ 10 = 15)
00000000001000001100010010110011
# SLT x10, x1, x2 (x10 = (x1 < x2) ? 1 : 0 = 1)
00000000001000001010010100110011
# SLL x11, x1, x4 (x11 = x1 << x4 = 5 << 3 = 40)
00000000010000001001010110110011
# SRL x12, x2, x4 (x12 = x2 >> x4 = 10 >> 3 = 1)
00000000010000010101011000110011
# SRA x13, x3, x4 (x13 = x3 >> x4 = -1 >> 3 = -1)
01000000010000011101011010110011
